Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Marketing, Advertising and PR

abstract.p: Palm Inc's latest celebrity-endorsed handheld device is named after model/actress Claudia Schiffer (S)

block.p: Palm Inc. has announced its new celebrity-endorsed P.D.A. And what public intellectual did the company choose for this honor? Was it Stephen Hawking? No. Stephen Jay Gould? Close. The Palm Vx Claudia Schiffer Edition, named after the German runway model and actress, will go on sale in the fall. Buyers may also want to download www.utilware.com /mirror.html, which is free. It turns the Palm screen into a handy mirror.
